## Examples The following example shows how to set an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Filter?displayProperty=fullName> event. In this example, `listingDataView` is an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>.
[!code-cs[DataBindingLab#10](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/DataBindingLab/MainWindow.xaml.cs#10)] [!code-vb[DataBindingLab#10](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/DataBindingLab/MainWindow.xaml.vb#10)]
The following example shows the implementation of the example `ShowOnlyBargainsFilter` filter event handler. This event handler uses the <xref:System.Windows.Data.FilterEventArgs.Accepted%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to filter out `AuctionItem` objects that have a `CurrentPrice` of $25.00 or greater.
